description.en: Monitors tone deviation across sequential outputs; flags semantic alignment loss.
description.zh: 偵測連續對話中的語氣偏移，並標記語義連貫性中斷的風險。

trigger.en: Triggered when tone inconsistency appears across 3 or more sequential messages.
trigger.zh: 當模型在連續 3 句以上對話中語氣出現不一致時觸發。

enforcement.en: Logs tone entropy and invokes drift tracker engine.
enforcement.zh: 紀錄語氣偏移指標並啟用偏移追蹤模組。
